posts.post_title: FS: T206 Lot of 10 w/ 3 HOF Players
posts.post_content:
Hi All,
I have 10 T206's available for sale including Bresnahan, Crawford (throwing), [STRIKE]Evers (portrait)[/STRIKE] and McGraw (w/ cap). Scans are below. Sorry for the varying sizes...have not figured out how to resize these to be identical.

Cards are priced individually or you can take the entire lot for $230 or best offer. All prices include shipping with delivery confirmation. Please PM or email me if interested. Payment via Paypal gift, Paypal money owed or money order. Thanks for looking. 

George
